name: Edgy AF - Purple - Relics of Avabur
description:
A simple theme with sharp edges in bright colors made for Relics of Avabur.

You must have the Classic theme selected in Account Management in order to use this theme.
additional_info: Credit to Reltorakii (edvordo) for his Relics of Avabur - Rewamped themes. If it were not for his code, I wouldn't have been able to figure out how to do this.
